He quoted Energy secretary Chris Huhne , who had declared that Left untouched, the electricity market would allow a new dash for gas, increasing our dependence on a single fuel, and exposing us to volatile prices . JOSE, Calif.-- Google co-founder Larry Page will take charge of the company's day-to-day operations as chief executive officer, replacing current CEO Eric Schmidt , who will focus on strategic projects and new products. We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time, Eric Schmidt said in a statement released by Google.`` By clarifying our individual roles, we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. Europa. Eric Schmidt ha confirmado durante una rueda de prensa en Alemania que Google emprender nuevas contrataciones en Europa. La compa?a tiene prevista la incorporaci?n de 1.000 nuevos puestos de trabajo a su plantilla. Nos hemos fijamos este a?o como uno de los objetivos principales el crecimiento en Europa. Vamos a invertir en Europa ha comentado Eric Schmidt en declaraciones recogidas por el diario The Gguardian. El n?mero de incorporaciones previstas supone un incremento de la plantilla europea de un 20 por ciento. Actualmente Google cuenta con aproximadamente 5.000 trabajadores entre Europa,

The next step is to reduce U.S. unemployment, an issue Barack Obama should make`` the centerpiece'' of his annual State of the Union address on Jan. 25, the former Cabinet member said. The American people are expecting him to say something about what he's going to do to keep the economy moving forward, Colin Powell said. Colin Powell has criticized his own party in recent months while supporting Barack Obama 's ultimately successful fight for Senate ratification of a new nuclear-arms-reduction treaty with Russia.
